title: Pennsylvanian Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Pennsylvanian
bottom_text:
Local connecting trains are provided:
at New York by the MTA,
at New York, Newark, and Trenton by NJ Transit,
and at Trenton, Philadelphia, and Paoli by SEPTA.

The eastbound Capitol Limited connection is unreliable due to delays caused by Norfolk Southern between Chicago and Pittsburgh.
